item.title: Buy Low and Sell High Strategy
item.description:
Supervisor: René AïD
Accomplished At: University Paris Dauphine
It is essential to pursuit high profit for all the participants in the market. Especially in the stock market, amount of investors and analysts comes up with a lots of strate- gies and models, one of which is the Buy-low Sell-high strategies.
